Farmers in Europe step up protests against rising costs, green rulesFrench and Belgian farmers set up dozens of blockades on highways and on access roads to a major container port on Wednesday to press governments to ease environmental rules and protect them from rising costs and cheap imports. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:33:40 GMT TMXS66PCFNJZFFG7IRVAOVFKH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/farmers-europe-step-up-protests-against-rising-costs-green-rules-2024-01-31/Marco Trujillo, Philip Blenkinsop可持续发展气候与能源
Malaysia cabinet discusses Najib pardon bid, but won't announce outcome - ministerMalaysia's cabinet has discussed a request by jailed former premier Najib Razak for a royal pardon but has no authority to make any announcement, its home minister said on Wednesday, amid frenzied speculation about the outcome. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:13:21 GMT QBEW5IL6BFIQNIYEU4QIG5NPMM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-cabinet-discusses-najib-pardon-bid-wont-announce-outcome-minister-2024-01-31/Danial Azhar, Rozanna Latiff世界亚太地区
Main criminal cases against Pakistan's Imran KhanPakistan's former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Khan were each handed a 14-year jail sentence on Wednesday in a case related to illegal selling of state gifts. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:12:21 GMT H32Y57DGZ5P6TL65XLUO2ST6ZE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/main-criminal-cases-against-pakistans-imran-khan-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
US says fentanyl talks with China 'meaningful' but more needs to be done-officialTalks between the U.S. and Chinese officials on stemming the flow of chemicals used for the production of deadly fentanyl have been "substantive" but "much more" needs to be done, the head of the White House delegation to Beijing said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:04:27 GMT UXX5QVAOSBIXXKWZARNXFZXT7A https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-fentanyl-talks-with-china-meaningful-more-needs-be-done-official-2024-01-31/Antoni Slodkowski世界
Strikes to ground flights at major German airports on ThursdayStrikes will ground flights on Thursday at some of Germany's biggest airports, including the global hub Frankfurt, in the latest wave of industrial action by transport workers to hit Europe's largest economy, officials said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:53:00 GMT G4JGDEYFLBOJXL5YEE6XSBK7DI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/strikes-ground-flights-major-german-airports-thursday-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Meta, TikTok, X CEOs to face tough questions on child safety at US Senate hearingThe chief executives of social media companies Meta , X, TikTok, Snap , and Discord will face tough questions Wednesday on efforts to combat online child sexual exploitation at a U.S. Senate hearing on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:51:36 GMT 7L6XO3JWVBPUZHMDNTBRKFKV6Y https://www.reuters.com/technology/meta-tiktok-x-ceos-face-tough-questions-child-safety-us-senate-hearing-2024-01-31/David Shepardson, Makini Brice技术
Argentina can appeal in hedge funds' lawsuit over GDP-linked securitiesArgentina has been given permission to appeal after losing a London lawsuit brought by four hedge funds over euro-denominated securities which left the country facing a roughly $1.5 billion bill, Argentina's lawyers said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:50:35 GMT 7MZAJTQCMJPTBAHRV3EHNQ324Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-can-appeal-hedge-funds-lawsuit-over-gdp-linked-securities-2024-01-31/Reuters世界美洲
Taiwan military simulates China turning drills into an attackTaiwan's military on Wednesday simulated a scenario where China suddenly turns one of its regular drills around the island into an actual attack, on the same day China staged another "combat readiness patrol" near Taiwan. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:37:27 GMT B4LLUS67O5PRJF7MOW6马拉蒂https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-military-simulates-china-turning-drills-into-an-attack-2024-01-31/Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
EU's top diplomat says Russian influence causing dilemma in SahelThe European Union is facing a dilemma over its remaining presence in Mali and the wider West African Sahel region, since it does not want to cooperate with Russia's expanding military forces, its top diplomat said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:25:54 GMT 4SDW5BYMDZKTDFSU6L2OCYGA2M https://www.reuters.com/world/eus-top-diplomat-says- Russian-influence-causing-dilemma-sahel-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Chinese hackers are targeting US infrastructure, FBI chief to testifyHackers linked to the Chinese government are targeting critical infrastructure in the US, preparing to cause "real-world harm" to Americans, FBI chief plans to tell a House of Representatives panel on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:15:10 GMT I4YYTKHNUFNSHKT3WZ2F4QA3DI https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/chinese-hackers-are-targeting-us-infrastruct-fbi-chief-testify-2024-01-31/Andrew Goudsward技术网络安全
The logistics of war: How Washington is preparing for a Chinese invasion of TaiwanThe United States is increasingly worried that in the coming years Chinese President Xi Jinping could order his military to seize Taiwan. So the U.S. military is trying to play catch-up in a critical area: its logistics network. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:06:35 GMT YLTKK6MJLBM6HJ6KJWQMUEFN5I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/logistics-war-how-washington-is-preparing-chinese-invasion-taiwan-2024-01-31/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中国
